channel.title: Cryptographi on Welcome!

item.title: Shiro Hero
item.description: Challenge: For this chall we have to download 4 files. Chall.py from secrets import randbits from prng import xorshiro256 from Crypto.Cipher import AES from Crypto.Util.Padding import pad, unpad from ecc import ECDSA from Crypto.Util.number import bytes_to_long, long_to_bytes import hashlib flag = open("flag.txt", "rb").read() state = [randbits(64) for _ in range(4)] prng = xorshiro256(state) leaks = [prng.next_raw() for _ in range(4)] print(f"PRNG leaks: {[hex(x) for x in leaks]}") Apriv, Apub = ECDSA.
